projectCards.title: Thread Clone
projectCards.subtitle: social media platform
projectCards.description: To get started, you need to create an account with an e-amil and a password. After that, you can interact with other users by sharing posts, photos and videos.

projectCards.title: Where in the World?
projectCards.subtitle: rest countries API
projectCards.description: User can see all countries from the data source and search for a country by keyword, filter countries by region. Country card shows see more detailed information on a separate page. Light and dark mode available

projectItems.title: Supernova Black
projectItems.subtitle: candidate portfolio
projectItems.description: Candidate Supernova Black is running for mayor in Meow-Li. He has created this website with some animations to get more support!

projectItems.title: Web Calculator
projectItems.subtitle: with color themes
projectItems.description: This app can perform mathmatical operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. And even for more joy, use can adjust color theme based on their preference.

projectItems.title: Backstage Talks
projectItems.subtitle: A Frontend Practice Project
projectItems.description: A replica of Backstage Talks - Magazine Archive website. With special scroll effect
